input.sentences: the flower girl was so cute
the brides father walked her down the isle
the bride and groom sat and waited to kiss
the groom and his best man posed for pictures
the couple got married on the ocean
output.sentences: The flower girl was wearing a cute dress.
She watched as the bride was walked down the aisle by the bride's father.
And then the bride and groom sat down and waited just before they kissed.
Everyone posed for pictures, even the groom and his friends.
The happy couple were finally married, standing by the ocean.
